entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
